name: Bert the Beetle
description:
Bert is a beetle who knows its purpose. That purpose is to push big dungballs and move forward in life. What else is there really?

This game was made for the Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2022. The theme of the game jam was BIG. The game was made using Unity. You can find the source code for this project in here.

Team OvereNgIneErS:

  • Ab (Audio, Code) - GitHub | Itch.io
  • Cylpen (Art, Code) - GitHub | Itch.io
  • Dex (Art, Code) - GitHub | Itch.io
  • Mikey4785 (Art) - GitHub | Itch.io

  • Yeknom (Art, Code) - GitHub | Itch.io
